headline: New York Is Urged to Consider Surge Pricing for Yellow Taxis
abstract: The city could become one of the first in the United States to allow yellow cabs to raise prices when demand is high.
lead_paragraph: New York City should consider allowing yellow cabs to use some of the same strategies as the ride-hailing companies Uber and Lyft, including so-called surge pricing when demand is high, a government panel is set to recommend.
